definition.name: Setup Go environment
definition.description: Setup a Go environment and add it to the PATH, additionally providing proxy support
definition.author: GitHub

inputs.name: go-version
inputs.description: The Go version to download (if necessary) and use. Example: 1.9.3

inputs.name: version
inputs.description: Deprecated. Use go-version instead. Will not be supported after October 1, 2019
